CSSSkew.summary: The CSSSkew interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API is part of the interface. It represents the {{cssxref("transform-function/skew", "skew()")}} value of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS.

CSSSkewAx.summary:
The ax property of the
interface gets and sets the angle used to distort the element
along the x-axis (or abscissa).

CSSSkewAy.summary:
The ay property of the
interface gets and sets the angle used to distort the element
along the y-axis (or ordinate).

CSSSkewCSSSkew.summary:
The CSSSkew() constructor creates a new
object which represents the
transform-function/skew value
of the individual 'transform' property in CSS.
